DOC.brief_summary: A study evaluate safety , tolerability , efficacy MK-0773 woman sarcopenia ( loss muscle mass ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Safety Efficacy MK-0773 Women With Sarcopenia ( Loss Muscle Mass ) ( MK-0773-005 )
DOC.criteria: Patient woman 65 year age older Patient 's lean body mass least 1 standard deviation mean healthy young adult population Patient difficulty climb 10 step walk outside level ground 1/4 mile without rest Activity Measure Post Acute Care ( AMPAC ) < 66 Patient serious neurological , rheumatologic , cardiac , respiratory , kidney , psychiatric condition Patient history certain type cancer
